name: WALLED IN (biscuitcrow)
description:
You're a bug trapped in a room. In fact, you're so much of a wallflower you won't even risk flying across to that open window! Tread carefully along the walls in this little puzzler. 

Avoid stepping on any post its, push away the to-do lists getting in your way, soak up the weird water stains with the lists! Reach the open window and taste your final reward - freedom.

Includes:

  • One cute ladybug
  • At least one level (get your money's worth!)
  • Cool and original pixel art 

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Drag post-its with cursor
  • Push to-do lists with Ladybug

Dev note:

This game probably has a lot of bugs. If you want the intended experience, try not to push it too hard. (but let me know if there's any glaring bugs) If you want to break the game, well, go ham I guess! Who am I to tell you how to have fun!

These are probably the world's easiest puzzles because I am... not the best at puzzle design but hey.

All art by me!
